text: Samuel Hugh Stowell Akinsope "Sope" JohnsonChurch Times Nigeria was Provost of the Cathedral Church of Christ, LagosThe Nation online from 1970 until 1995.News Diary online Johnson was educated at King's College, LondonVirtue On-line and Lichfield Theological College.Crockford's Clerical Directory 1980-1982, London, Church House, 1983, From 1955 to 1962 he gained experience in London as a curate (including two years at St. Martin-in-the Fields) before returning to Nigeria to become the head of religious broadcasting at the Nigerian Broadcasting Corporation.Osun Defender ==Notes== Category:Nigerian Anglicans Category:Alumni of King's College London Category:Alumni of Lichfield Theological College Category:Anglican provosts of Lagos
title: Sope Johnson
